name: DesignerDuo
description:
Designer Duo

You have to make a game for a GameJam that ends in less then half a day. A lot of co-workers left. The only two who stayed is you and your Boss.

What it can be like when making a game?

Made for the Third Legends Game Jam.
(Theme: You Control the Game)

Assets:
UI Pack: RPG Expansion - Kenney
Other pictures were taken from different sites linked through Google Images.

PS: Nobody was actually kicked while developing this game.
